title: AI Code Assistant
caption: Built a smart coding assistant using Gemini API. It understands context and suggests optimizations.
fullDescription: A comprehensive VS Code extension that leverages the Gemini API to provide real-time code suggestions, refactoring tips, and documentation generation. Built with TypeScript and React for the webview.

title: E-Commerce Dashboard
caption: Modern analytics dashboard for online stores. Real-time data visualization with Recharts.
fullDescription: A high-performance dashboard built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features include dark mode, real-time sales tracking via WebSocket, and inventory management.

title: Cybersecurity Scanner
caption: Automated vulnerability scanner for web applications. Detects XSS and SQL injection patterns.
fullDescription: A Python-based CLI tool that scans web applications for common security vulnerabilities. Integrates with CI/CD pipelines for automated security testing.

title: Social Media App
caption: A clone of a popular social media platform with real-time chat and stories.
fullDescription: Full-stack social media application with features like infinite scroll, real-time messaging, and ephemeral stories. Backend powered by Node.js and MongoDB.
